message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CL 

This paper is about a new approach for semantic segmentation, which is a computer vision task. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also introduces attention mechanisms and global context, which are common topics in machine learning and artificial intelligence, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) likely sub-categories as well. Additionally, the paper uses neural networks, which falls under cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Finally, the paper involves natural language processing techniques, such as semantic labeling, which is a sub-topic of cs.CL (Computation and Language).
